0: There is an executive floor number 12 with free wi fi and access to the executive lounge which is nice although the executive lounge is quite basic small snacks no alcohol
The hotel is situated far away from any restaurants or shops meaning that you have to take taxis or public transit for even the most basic purchase
Lunch in the dining room was cold and sparse although reasonably priced
At the restaurant obtaining attention from them to place an order or even paying has been a slow ordeal met by total indifference from the staff
The restaurant has the most awful level of service that I have ever experienced
They are strictly kosher so there are two different restaurants
There are no dining options within easy walking distance of the hotel
Dinner buffet is a little expensive
When we got to breakfast the salads had no sneeze guards and the hot foods were cold so we could n’t eat the food
The service in the breakfast was also horrible
1: The pool food rooms milky restaurant waiters etc were all fantastic
Awesome place free breakfast 2 restaurants in this place live music from a piano beautiful lobby has a indoor outdoor pool fitness center best of all a quiet place
Like all good Israeli hotels breakfast buffet is lavish
Dozens of cheeses salads fish fruit coffees dairy products olives vegetables etc
The breakfast is good and the coffee is now also good
We also held an event in which we hosted people for dinner
The facilities were supposed to be great convinient rooms indoor pool breakfast
Loved the position breakfast was amazing loved the pool and the staff were great
